parameters: <ActiveMessage:\C[1]■EV発生■>

\N<Irime>Hey Segi, how are you holding up? Though I guess it's silly
to ask, considering what's ahead of us.

\N<Segi>Well... yes. I'm not accustomed to fighting... Thinking
about it sometimes gets me down.
\N<Segi>Not that it's an excuse, but... I envy you, Irime.

\N<Irime>You're mistaken, I'm not as strong as you think. No matter
how much I train, a woman's slender arms might not be a
match for a burly man.
\N<Segi>...You might be right about that.

\N<Irime>But that doesn't mean we're at a dead end. That's when you
use your head. You fight with something other than muscle.
\N<Segi>Use your head...?

\N<Irime>Yeah, for example, let's assume your opponent is also a weak
man. In that case, he might use some special tool he got
just for fighting you, right?
\N<Segi>...

\N<Irime>We might not know what makes it special, but one thing's for
sure—it's a tool meant to whittle down your strength. It'd
be wise to prepare countermeasures just in case.

\N<Irime>For someone like you who's not used to fighting, defense
will likely be key. Endure and endure, and when an
opportunity arises, that's when you find your way out.
\N<Segi>Endure... and wait for an opportunity...

\N<Irime>Exactly. That's what using your head means. Never give up on
anything.
\N<Segi>Yes... Thank you very much.

\N<Segi>I thought I was prepared, but maybe I was just scared.
Talking with you has given me a bit of courage.
\N<Irime>That's the spirit. Let's both make sure we survive this.
\N<Segi>...Yes.
A

\N<Irime>Let's assume, for instance, that your opponent is a man of
little strength. In that case, isn't it possible he'll come
at you with some special tool he acquired just for the
fight?

\N<Irime>We may not know what makes it special, but one thing's for
sure—it's a tool designed to whittle down your fighting
power. It would be wise to take precautions against it, just
in case.

\N<Irime>For someone like you, who's probably not accustomed to
battle, defense will be key. Endure and endure, and
eventually, you'll find an opening to turn the tide.

\N<Irime>As I've said before, your enemy Hojiko is a merchant. He's
the type who can be shrewd, for better or worse.

\N<Irime>In other words, there might be room for negotiation if you
dangle money or profits in front of him. Of course, that
will require having something of considerable value to
offer.
weather : 0 : 5 : 5 : 15 : 1 : Light_01D : 1
weather : 1 : 5 : 5 : 5 : 1 : Light_01C : 1

\N<Rame>Hello, Segi-san. Ah, um... Aren't you with Riia-chan today?
If it's okay, could you... p-please give my regards to him?
<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■EV発生■>

\N<Rame>Hello, Segi-san. It seems like Riia-chan has been doing
nothing but training at the dojo lately.

\N<Rame>She's all about getting stronger quickly... That's all she
talks about. To me, it looks like she's in a rush...
A

\N<Rame>Hello, Segi-san. It seems like Riia-chan has been doing
nothing but training at the dojo lately.

\N<Rame>She's all about getting stronger quickly... That's all she
talks about. To me, it looks like she might be in a rush for
something...

\N<Rame>...Is there nothing I can do...? While Mama is fighting with
all her might, all I'm doing is trembling...

\N<Irime's Husband>Hey, Segi-san... did you come to visit me? I'm sorry... for
being in such a state...
\N<Segi>No... don't worry about that. How are you feeling?

\N<Irime's Husband>Not too bad, but still... I've been seriously ill, and as
you can see, I can't move around freely.

\N<Irime's Husband>That's why, swallowing my pride, I want to ask you for a
favor... about my wife. About Irime...

\N<Irime's Husband>She's always concerned about me and acts bravely, but she's
a woman with a fragile core. However, I literally can't
support her or be the strength she needs...

\N<Irime's Husband>Especially at times like these... I want you, someone I
trust, to be her strength in my stead.
\N<Segi>...Understood. If I can be of any help, then certainly.
\N<Irime's Husband>Thank you... hearing those words puts me at ease.

\N<Irime's Husband>Not knowing what will become of my wife and daughter... and
the future of this town... it's frustrating to be so
powerless.

\N<Segi>Please don't worry about that and focus on your recovery.
Surely that's what's best for Irime-san and everyone else.
\N<Irime's Husband>...Thank you. You are a kind-hearted woman...
